name: @ekscss/framework
description: Progressive CSS framework powered by ekscss
author: Max Milton <max@happycode.ltd>

scripts.build: yarn prebuild && xcss level1.xcss dist/level1.css --map && xcss level2.xcss dist/level2.css --map && xcss level3.xcss dist/level3.css --map
scripts.build__REMOVE_ME: yarn prebuild && xcss level1.xcss dist/level1.css --map; xcss level2.xcss dist/level2.css --map; xcss level3.xcss dist/level3.css --map
